function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Biophilia leading to close contact with infectious organisms or vectors","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Promoting biophilia in controlled indoor environments, implementing infection control measures, and educating individuals on safe interactions with natural elements","Technologies":"Air purification systems, UV-C disinfection, and smart ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and residents","Owner":"Architects, building managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Loss of biodiversity leading to environmental imbalance and disease emergence","Impact":"Potential for new or re-emerging infectious diseases due to disrupted ecosystems","Mitigation":"Conservation efforts, sustainable land use, and biodiversity protection policies","Technologies":"Satellite imagery, remote sensing, and ecological monitoring tools","People":"Ecologists, conservationists, and policymakers","Owner":"Environmental organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Shift in focus of biophilia theory leading to neglect of human-nature relationship","Impact":"Reduced awareness of the importance of human-nature connection in public health","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns, community engagement programs, and integration of biophilic design principles","Technologies":"Virtual reality simulations, immersive nature experiences, and biophilic design software","People":"Public health practitioners, urban planners, and environmental advocates","Owner":"Community organizations and government agencies"}]}
